title: BRIEF-Cambridge Analytica Says It Did Not Use Facebook Data In Services For Trump Campaign
text: March 19, 2018 / 7:18 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Cambridge Analytica Says It Did Not Use Facebook Data In Services For Trump Campaign Reuters Staff March 19 (Reuters) - CAMBRIDGE ANALYTICA : * CAMBRIDGE ANALYTICA SAYS “STRONGLY DENIES” CLAIMS RECENTLY MADE IN THE MEDIA * CAMBRIDGE ANALYTICA SAYS “FACEBOOK DATA WAS NOT USED BY CAMBRIDGE ANALYTICA AS PART OF SERVICES IT PROVIDED TO DONALD TRUMP PRESIDENTIAL CAMPAIGN” * CAMBRIDGE ANALYTICA SAYS “WE DID NOT WORK ON BREXIT REFERENDUM IN THE UK” * CAMBRIDGE ANALYTICA - IN 2014, GOT FACEBOOK DATA AND DERIVATIVES FROM CO NAMED GSR THAT WAS ENGAGED TO LEGALLY SUPPLY DATA FOR RESEARCH * CAMBRIDGE ANALYTICA - SOURCE FOR MEDIA REPORTS IS FORMER CONTRACTOR FOR CAMBRIDGE ANALYTICA WHO LEFT IN 2014, NOT A FOUNDER * CAMBRIDGE ANALYTICA - AFTER IT BECAME KNOWN GSR BROKE CONTRACT, FIRM DELETED ALL FACEBOOK DATA & DERIVATIVES, IN COOPERATION WITH FACEBOOK Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
